description: BBC Radio Derby's Dominic Dietrich is joined by former Derby academy coach Darren Robinson plus reaction from Rams boss Paul Warne after the 6-5 penalty defeat to Leyton Orient in the third round of the FA Cup.
title: Rams Daily: Derby County exit FA Cup on penalties
title_page: Rams Daily: Derby County exit FA Cup on penalties - BBC Sport
